tool_description: CountriesNow provides geolocation, population, and general information about countries, states, and cities (in simple JSON responses).
name: CountriesNow
title: CountriesNow

api_list.name: GetcountriesandISO2&3Codes
api_list.description: get all countries with their ISO2&3 Codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countriesnow.p.rapidapi.com/iso"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countriesnow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://countriesnow.p.rapidapi.com/iso"
